entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
